attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in KAREN LUMLEY
attributes.additional_details: If you want to vote of no confidence in Karen Lumley and have her step down vote now. !
attributes.background:
Karen has done nothing for the constituents for Redditch and IGNOR's emails and concerns. 

She said that there was nothing to worry about to do with the Alexandre Hospital !  And now we are loosing it !!

rejection.details: We can't accept this petition because it asks for something that neither the House of Commons nor the Government can do. The expression "vote of no confidence" is used when talking about a vote in the House of Commons which tests whether or not the Government of the day has the confidence of a majority of MPs in the House of Commons. That's why we allow petitions asking for a vote of no confidence in the Government or in individual Ministers. The concept of the House having “confidence” in someone does not apply to The concept of the House having “confidence” in someone does not apply to backbench or Opposition MPs.
